summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2183, for the improvement of 9th Avenue in the City of Seattle, from Union Street to Pine Street, by constructing concrete sidewalks, or wooden sidewalks thereon where necessary, under Ordinance No. 21742 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
